lom:description.lom:string: Governors State University is in a unique position to collaborate with community colleges and research institutions. The university offers upper division courses for bachelor degrees and courses for masters degrees. This demonstration project works on best practices of cooperation among universities, community colleges and Argonne National Laboratory; and to optimally use the limited resources to better serve the targeted groups.

lom:title.lom:string: BPC-DP: Collaborative and Integrative Environment for Computer Science Programs
